about_the_game: Play the first stage of SoundStorm in this demo version.
detailed_description: Play the first stage of SoundStorm in this demo version.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.15 and above
  • Processor: Any Intel Core
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics
  • Additional Notes: This game runs well on OSX Catalina. Please ignore that message.

name: SoundStorm Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Any Intel Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: A Shoot 'em Up with music driven gameplay. Bullets flash to the rythm of the music. Hit the bullets exactly on the beat to destroy them and make chain reactions. Feel the music and enjoy the unique game experience combining patterns and rhythms.
